Banner.Description:
I'm a Full Stack Developer with experience in
Ruby, Python, JavaScript, React, AWS, Heroku, and Databases.

Managed the development of multiple projects valued at over $80,000 thousand.

I am a highly motivated software engineer with experience in developing, designing, and maintaining high-quality software.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: With experience in full-stack development, I've contributed to numerous projects, collectively valued at over 80,000 thousand dollars.

I am a passionate software engineer dedicated to creating exceptional user experience applications by thoroughly understanding business requirements and collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams. My focus is on driving business success through innovative and user-centric software solutions.

I have experience in both application development and infrastructure management, with a focus on writing maintainable and easily understandable code. I possess a strong understanding of software engineering principles.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Enhanced performance and scalability by designing and developing optimized database schemas, which improved the efficiency of applications.
Developed complete websites from UI design to live deployment, ensuring seamless user experience and robust functionality.
Boosted system performance and user satisfaction by collaborating with cross-functional teams to integrate innovative features and refine existing ones.

Effectively utilized version control systems to manage code updates and collaborate with team members, ensuring seamless integration and project continuity, and participated in code review meetings providing input on bugs, inefficiencies and potential solutions to emergent issues.
Reduced bugs by 30% through implementing automated tests, ensuring application reliability and stability.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, ideas, or opportunities to discuss, I'm here to help. Reach out today, and I'll respond as soon as possible. Let's connect and create something amazing together!
